snippet.title: Fears that music volume limits 'could be ignored'
snippet.description:
Health / 4 February 2013
… as overexposure to loud music can trigger tinnitus, and remember that a good pair of noise cancelling headphones can make all the difference."

snippet.title: The Bristol Hum: your viewpoints
snippet.description:
People & Places / 18 May 2009
… and couldn't hear anything. I am looking forward to the day that it is found out and stopped or I may just go crazy. I have tried noise cancelling…

snippet.title: What noise gets on your nerves?
snippet.description:
Africa / 9 October 2007
… the most annoying sound ever. It's far worse than the jack hammering outside from all the construction. I had to get noise cancelling headphones…
